name: No One's Sky
description:
Inspired by Hello Games' No Man's Sky, No One's Sky is a game about flying to planets, waiting to refuel your craft and not much else! Hundreds of spaceships to use and planets to find! JUST LIKE NO MAN'S SKY, THIS GAME DOES NOT HAVE MULTIPLAYER! ;^)

Music/sound credits:

EKO LAB dub80 by Robodub

Blue Line Loop by DL Sounds

Spaceship Takeoff Sound by Richard
